definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Results There nitrite was detected from the gastric juice of the poisoning patients.
sentences.chinese: 結果在患者的洗胃液及嘔吐物中均檢出亞硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: It is possible for meat to remain pinkish-red all through the cooking if it has been exposed to nitrites.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽處理過的肉烹飪時也能保持粉紅色。

sentences.english: It is a difficult problem to decrease the amount of nitrite in a normal limit of vegetables pickling.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽含量超標一直是醃漬蔬菜生產中的一個難題。

sentences.english: The analytic methods of nitrite in edible salt were described.
sentences.chinese: 文章提出了食用鹽中亞硝酸鹽的測定方法。

sentences.english: Nitrite is used for curing meat.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽一般用於加工肉類食品。

sentences.english: N-Nitrosamine can be formed in vivo by the interaction of nitrites with secondary amines .
sentences.chinese: 亞硝胺可由其前體物質亞硝酸鹽及二級胺在體內合成。

sentences.english: Methods The nitrite was detected from samples by N-Naphthylethylenediamine Dihydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 方法用鹽酸萘乙二胺法檢測樣品中的亞硝酸鹽。

sentences.english: Chlorpromazine hydrochloride (CPH ) is oxidized by hydrogen peroxide under the catalyzing of nitrite.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽催化氯丙嗪與過氧化氫的氧化反應。

sentences.english: The peak of nitrite in the supernatant was at 6 h.
sentences.chinese: 細胞上清中的亞硝酸鹽含量高峯在6小時。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the nitrite content of unpacked salted vegetables marketed in Xinxiang City.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解新鄉市市售散裝鹽醃菜中亞硝酸鹽的含量。

sentences.english: Nitrites and nitrates have long been recognized as potent carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 亞硝酸鹽和硝酸鹽被認爲是強力致癌物。

sentences.english: Ala is a ham products contain high levels of nitrites material.
sentences.chinese: 火腿本身是醃臘製品，含有大量亞硝酸鹽類物質。

sentences.english: And blood tests before and after breakfast confirmed nitrite levels in the body.
sentences.chinese: 並且早餐前後進行血液測驗確定身體內亞硝酸鹽水平。

sentences.english: NO production was quantitated by measuring the NO oxidation product, nitrite, in conditioned culture medium;
sentences.chinese: 測定NO的氧化產物亞硝酸鹽來定量NO的生成。

sentences.english: Nitrite, which is used in cured meats, also functions as a bacteriostat .
sentences.chinese: 用於俺肉的亞硝酸鹽也具有抑菌劑的功能。

sentences.english: The suitable percent of the sodium nitrite as antifreezing agent was obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得到了亞硝酸鹽鈉作爲防凍劑的最佳摻量。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1
